The Rarest ballad that ever was seen, of the blind beggars daughter of Bednal-green.
1 sheet ([1] p.) : ill.
Printed for F. Coles, T. Vere, and I. Wright., [London] : [between 1663 and 1674]
Place and date of publication taken from Wing (2nd ed.) Contains 1 illustration. Reproduction of original in: University of Glasgow. Library.
